subject: Baseball
Human Growth Hormone
Steroids
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: For Alex Rodriguez a directive to use a different surgeon for his latest hip surgery is followed by unease over possible past links to a Miami-area man being investigated by Major League Baseball.
snippet: For Alex Rodriguez a directive to use a different surgeon for his latest hip surgery is followed by unease over possible past links to a Miami-area man being investigated by Major League Baseball.
